attributes.action: Michael Schumacher be crowned king of formula 1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that michael schumacher deserves to be crowned king of formula 1 has he has done such a lot to the support  to the formula 1 sport. and to his loyal fans,that he is loyal and honest and  please bestow this honor for all the achievemnts he has done since 1991 -2006. he is rightfully a great sporting legend of the 20th century.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
